Title: libgit2: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libgit2, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you to write native speed custom Git applications in any language that supports C bindings.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libgit2. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All libgit2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
